events.message: I want to return the jacket I bought last week because it doesn't fit me at all and I'd like a full refund.
The system has automatically categorized this ticket under Refund as the customer requested a return and refund.
Support agent Emily has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request for the jacket.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your return. Iâ€™m here to help you get your refund processed as smoothly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm the condition of the jacket so we can proceed with the refund?
The order number is 4587321, and the jacket is unused with all original tags still attached.
Thank you for the details. You can return the jacket using our prepaid shipping label, and once we receive it, we will issue a full refund within 5 business days.
That sounds great! I appreciate the quick response and the prepaid shipping label option makes this very easy.
I have emailed you the prepaid shipping label. Please ship the jacket back within 7 days so we can complete your refund promptly.
Just following up to ensure you received our prepaid shipping label and to see if you need any further assistance with your return.
Your refund has been processed successfully, and this case is now closed. Thank you for shopping with us and contacting customer support.
